pli-tv-bi-pm:10.1: If a nun, intending to steal, takes from an inhabited area or from the wilderness what has not been given to him—
pli-tv-bi-pm:10.2: the sort of stealing for which kings, having caught a thief, would beat, imprison, or banish her, saying, ‘You’re a bandit, you’re a fool, you’ve gone astray, you’re a thief’
pli-tv-bi-pm:10.3: —she is expelled and excluded from the community.
pli-tv-bi-pm:11.1: If a nun intentionally kills a human being or seeks an instrument of death for her or praises death or incites someone to die, saying,
pli-tv-bi-pm:11.2: ‘My friend, what’s the point of this miserable and difficult life? Death is better for you than life!’—
